metadata.title: RA Family: Support for SM Bus on I2C Interface

sections.content:
Question:
Is there SM Bus support on I2C interface on FSP?
Answer:
The FSP 4.6.0 version does not support SMBUS stack as of now, but a future version may support this. Refer to release notes to see if/when it is added.
The FSP configuration allow 100Khz or 400Khz in SCI_I2C module and 100Khz or 400Khz or 1Mhz in IIC mode.
With a few additional modifications, it is possible to run the I2C module at the desired speed.
